channel.title: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work
channel.description: hey guys im trying to get xp lamps to work and well i need some help because i've used the google search bar as well as the one on here.If someone can help me out I'd really appreciate it.I have an Insidax source

item.title: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:8, topic:482298”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=600535.msg4217799#msg4217799 date=1360491864]
I will attempt help you, ^ useless comments.
[/quote]

Ok, my advice? Learn to program a little before even tackling an RSPS.

^ That is not a useless comment. That is what people tend not to do when trying to make a server.[/quote]

This. Luna, stop trying to act all big.

By the way Nick, here’s a switch statement explained from the Javadocs

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/switch.html

Read full topic

item.title: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

luna-scape:

I will attempt help you, ^ useless comments.

Christmas_tree:

Ok, my advice? Learn to program a little before even tackling an RSPS.

^ That is not a useless comment. That is what people tend not to do when trying to make a server.

item.source: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work

item.title: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:6, topic:482298”]I will attempt help you, ^ useless comments.

Go to clickitems.java

Add a new case

Like case ####:
//blabla
break;

The #### is the item id (so replace with ur lamp.) now make it when it clicks the lamp the interface for xp lamps pops up. Add the interface client sided. Now make it when u click a button on the interface it gives u the skill xp and deletes the lamp.[/quote]

It really wasn’t a useless comment. What you’re describing is the way to use a switch statement - one of the things you learn very early on in programming. You can take these skills and expand them into rsps

Read full topic
item.source: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work

item.title: [317 loading 604's] how to get xp lamps to work
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I will attempt help you, ^ useless comments.

Go to clickitems.java

Add a new case

Like case ####:
//blabla
break;

The #### is the item id (so replace with ur lamp.) now make it when it clicks the lamp the interface for xp lamps pops up. Add the interface client sided. Now make it when u click a button on the interface it gives u the skill xp and deletes the lamp.

Read full topic
